results.question: During the 1980s, Duke consistently participated in a prestigious early-season tournament. What is the name of that tournament, and did they win any titles during the 1980s?
Which Duke player won the John R. Wooden Award for the best player in college basketball in 2002?
Which Duke player won the ACC Player of the Year award in 2011?
In what year did Duke men's basketball achieve an undefeated regular season?
In 1991, Duke won their first NCAA Championship under Coach K. Who was the Most Outstanding Player (MOP) of the Final Four tournament that year?
In 2001, Duke won the NCAA Championship. Which team did they face, and what was the final score?
During the 2004-2005 season, which Duke player won the Naismith College Player of the Year award?
In the 2014-2015 season, Duke won the NCAA Championship under Coach K. Who was named the Most Outstanding Player (MOP) of the Final Four tournament?
What nickname was given to the Duke team during the late 1980s, led by players like Danny Ferry and Christian Laettner?
In the 1994 NCAA Championship game, Duke lost to Arkansas. Who was the head coach of the Arkansas team that year?
In 1992, Duke successfully defended their NCAA Championship title. Who did they defeat in the championship game, and what was the final score?
Which Duke player was selected as the first overall pick in the 1999 NBA Draft?
Duke won their first NCAA Championship in 1991. However, in the 1980s, they made it to the championship game twice but fell short. Name the years they reached the championship game.
During the 1985-1986 season, Duke set a school record for most wins in a season. How many wins did they achieve that year?
Which player was the leading scorer for Duke during the 1988-1989 season?
